attributes.action: Say No to Mcdonalds at the Liberty Stadium between the south stand and Brunel Way!
attributes.additional_details: Swansea council have approved the building of a Mcdonald's restaurant between the south stand and Brunel way at the Liberty stadium hampering the clubs expansion plans for the building of a new stand. Swansea City football club has brought a major boost with premier league football to the South Wales economy and the club needs a new stand to sustain premier league football into the future via revenue's from more new fans. Please petition against the building of this restaurant as it is not in the long term interests of the South Wales economy as a whole and the thousands of people it brings to the area.
